text_preview: **Virtual Care:** Any interaction between patients and/or members of their circle of care1 that occurs remotely2, using any form of communication or information technology, including telephone, video ...
title: Virtual Care

text_preview: 1. For more information about who is included in the circle of care, please see CPSO’s [*Protecting Personal Health Information*](https://www.cpso.on.ca/Physicians/Policies-Guidance/Policies/Protectin...
